response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it would significantly enhance your endeavors. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,250,000, a significant discount from its original valuation of $1,500,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to fostering long-term relationships with our esteemed clients. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 1250000}
